name: The First 20 Unknown Gray Portraits (The Extract)
description: In the digital work "The Unknown Gray Portraits" (from The Unknown Portraits Series), new fantasy portraits of unknown gray people are generated with every HTML refresh - from elements that were previously digitally painted. The combination is made up of 10 element types, each with up to 10 + 1 red variants. This is an extract of the first 20 generated Unknown Gray Portraits in the artist's browser. The works of The Unknown Portraits Series are digital drawings or paintings in which the artist addresses the "portraits" in the digital age - it's about avatars and profile pictures, face recognition and the handling of personal rights in today's world. It's about simplification. And it's about uniqueness.
